content:
the presence of Shar and you'll start to hear her communicate with Shadowheart. She will tell her to take the spear, step forward and strike down the Selunite. Shadowheart will disapprove of your choice to read her mind since that wasn't for you to hear.

The Chosen of Shar: Help Shadowheart finally become a Dark Justiciar.

After praying to Shar, Shadowheart told us that she needs to proceed to where a final test awaits her. If she succeeds, she shall be anointed as a Dark Justiciar.
